amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Resident Instruction Grants Program for Institutions of Higher Education in the Insular Areas.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding (by transfer) for resident instruction grants for insular areas by $200,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Faleomavaega amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Faleomavaega.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Faleomavaega amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
